an4.239:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.239:1.3: Savajjena kayakammena, savajjena vacikammena, savajjena manokammena, savajjaya ditthiya—
an4.239:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.239:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an4.239:2.3: Anavajjena kayakammena, anavajjena vacikammena, anavajjena manokammena, anavajjaya ditthiya—
an4.239:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
